results.name: A054523 * A115361.
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1275
formula: Equals A054523 * A115361 as infinite lower triangular matrices.
T(n,k) = phi(2*n/k) for k | n, T(n,k) = 0 otherwise. - _Andrew Howroyd_, Aug 07 2018

xref: Row sums are A129527 (inverse Moebius transform of A062570).
